::CyberShark::

    "He never said that the Peace talks should end," CyberS=
hark said. "As a matter of fact, I'm on my way to the Destron base after th=
e Predacons ignored me."
    He could now see the base, he couldn't wait to=
 talk with Magmatron again, hopefully he'd leave enough of CyberShark left =
to fill a cup. He landed and Transformed. He walked inside to see what was =
going on. He saw nothing. He walked into Magmatron's command room. As he en=
tered a holo image of what must have been Magmatron came up.
    "Automated=
 message 3458," The computer voice said.
    "CyberShark, you've returned,"=
 The image said. "You have done the right thing. Unicron has returned me to=
 Cybertron is your listening to this message. I wish for you to join me, go=
 to the Gateway and go through."
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: lo=
gomorph@... 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Wednesday, August 30=
, 2000 7:40 AM
  Subject: Re: Abandoning the embassy



       
       My G=
roups | nbwrpg Main Page | Start a new group!  


  ::Battera::

  "Are we =
going to hold the peace talks there in the mountain?"  She 
  sighed, "I wa=
s so close to...to.."  She couldn't help but choke up a 
  little.  She saw=
 her dreams of peace shatter and skatter to the 
  wind.  She lowered her h=
ead,"I'll be there as soon as I can."
  She lowered her head and let a tear=
 roll down her cheek.
  She whispered,"and the war will continue."


  --- =
In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "David Torrey" <Dachande85@m...> wrote:
  > ::CyberS=
hark::
  > 
  >     "I don't know why he's abandoning the base," CyberShark=
 
  said. "He sent a message and said that I was to go to the Mountain 
  b=
ase, and that I should contact them when I was ready to go."
